resources.string: We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your activity.
We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your customers.
We\'re sorry. Your account is limited. Please contact us for help.
We\'re sorry. Your recipient is unable to receive payments. Please contact us if you need help.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to delete your invoice. Please try again.
It looks like you can\'t send emails from this device.
It doesn\'t seem like you can send a text message from this device.
We\'re sorry. We experienced an issue loading your payment history. Please try again.
You don\'t have enough funds in your PayPal balance to cover this refund. The full refund amount will be drawn from %1$s and will take 3-5 working days to complete.
If you do not have sufficient PayPal balance this will come from your default funding source.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to record that refund. Please try again.
